presetNotes:
BiS perks for top: Biting 4 + Crackling 4
BiS perks for bottom:  Relentless 5-Impatient 4 + Venomblood-Mobile
BiS perks for offhand: Eruptive 4-Ruthless 3

primaryRelics.name: Fury of the Small
primaryRelics.description: All adrenaline generating basic abilities generate +1% adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: furyofthesmall

primaryRelics.name: Persistent Rage
primaryRelics.description: Your adrenaline now generates outside of combat at a rate of 5% every 1.2 seconds, instead of having it drained.
primaryRelics.label: persistentrage

primaryRelics.name: Death Ward
primaryRelics.description: 5% damage reduction when your life points are below 50%; 10% damage reduction when they are below 25%.
primaryRelics.label: deathward
